R0041.title: Card Cracking
R0041.definition: Obtaining valid payment information by enumerating different missing start/expiry dates and security codes.
R0041.description: Brute-forcing the start/expiry dates and security codes (CSC) of payment cards, also known as CVN2, CVC, CV2, or CID. The results of a carding attack (R0040) can be used to assess payment card or account value, while the results of card cracking (R0041) can be used for actual payments.
R0041.influence: Payment card or account payment information is stolen.

references.title: OWASP Automated Threat: OAT010 Card Cracking
